title: can't use items with the hotkeys. Could still chat and use abitlities
body: So i can't use items by pressing the hotkey like 12345 on the keyboard. I could still use abilities like q w e r{{summoner:14}} {{summoner:4}}  and chat normally, but the hotkeys for items wouldn't work{{item:2003}}

replies.body:
Were you using the number keys above qwerty or were you using the numpad? I don't believe you can use the numpad at all, but if the other ones aren't working that could be a problem. It may be that your config settings got messed up somehow, so we could try resetting those really quickly.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

Yes i am using the number above qwerty, ill try your way and hope for the best. So what do you mean by sync the settings. So i delete the config file, and then go into a practice game and check my setting, to see if it is ok or not. And then what should i for sync the settings and what is sync?
You should be using the numbers above qwerty! If those aren't working then try following those config reset steps I linked above!

thanks it worked
thanks a lot
